title: Princess Peach and the Precious Pearl
description: Treasure hunt!Princess Peach’s island holiday ends in disaster when her family accidentally leaves her behind. But at least she has her trusty dog Danny to play with until they come back to find her.Then Peach discovers a strange pattern on a wall that looks just like a map… Could she have found the map to Dread Pirate Redbeard’s buried treasure?But it turns out that someone else is looking for the treasure too, and they’re not going to let one nine-year-old princess get in the way. Peach will have to use all her courage to save the day – but can she do it by herself?Princess Peach book 2. A junior novel for ages 7-11.
author: Mary  Em
